title: Attack on TNA Parliamentarians: Defence Secy orders probe, action against attackers
content: Led by MP Mavai Senadhiraja, TNA MPs arrive at Jaffna Civil Affairs Office on Saturday to meet Jaffna Commander Maj. Gen. Mahinda Hathurusinghe. In the background is one of the vehicles, which the TNA said was damaged by the army – Pix by The Island. Defence Secretary Gotabhaya Rajapaksa directed Jaffna Army Commander Major General…
